content: narrow crochet skull scarf materials needed 3 5mm hook 2 skeins of super fine sock weight yarn yarn needle scissors abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet round round make two scarf s and sew/ whip stitch them together each part should have 8 skulls the finished scarf measures 6 1/4 wide 66 long it could be very helpful if you are familiar with the crochet skull shawl/döskallesjal pattern by kungen och majkis as parts of that pattern were used to create this one turn after each row start with chain 46 round 1 ch2 double_crochet in 4thch from hook 3 double_crochet * ch2 skip 2 st 4 double_crochet* to end of row round 2 ch4 *4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space* ch2 double_crochet round 3 ch2 3 double_crochet in space *ch2 4 double_crochet in space* to end of row 1 round 4 ch4 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch9 skip one space 4 double_crochet in next space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 double_crochet round 5 ch2 3 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch6 4 single_crochet around the chain ch6 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space round 6 -
